AN Act TO PROVIDE FOR THE BSTADLISHMENT OF A
CORPORATION TO CARRY ON BUSINESS AB AN
IMPORTER, EXPORTER, SELLER, SUPPLIER OR .
DISTRIBUTOR OF PETROLEUM, TO ENABLE THE .
COMPULSORY ACQUISITION OR REQUISITION FOR
SUCH CORPORATION OF ANY IMMOVABLE O8 MOVABLE
PROPERTY REQUIRED FOR THE PURPOSES OF SUCH
CORPORATION AND 10 PROVIDE FOR THE ESTABLIGH-
MENT OF A COMPENSATION TRIBUNAL; TO FROVIDE
FOR THE REGULATION AND CONTROL OF THE PRICE
OF PETROLEUM; AND TO MAKE PROVISION FOR
PURPOSES CONNECTED WITH THR MATTERS
AFORESAID,
. [Date of Assent: 20th May, 1961]

by and with the advice and consent of the Senate and

Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the :
same, as follows:
